description: Lime (T2) - Fell; Silver Maple (T4) - crown reduction by 4m; Lime (T6)- remove basal growth; Leyland Cypress screen (T12)- Reduce height by 2.5m and cut back side by up to 0.5m. Leyland Cypress (T14)- Reduce by 2.5m and cut back side by up to 0.5m; Sycamore (T20)- Reduce by 1.5 metres and thin by 10%; Silver Birch (T21) - Crown lift off garage roof by 1m; Atlas Cedar (T22) - Remove deadwood, tidy damaged limbs and reduce back where needed by 2.5-3m; Horse Chestnut (T26)- Reduce canopy by 2.5m; Holm Oak (T29)- reduce to previous reduction points by 3m; False Acacia (T35)- Reduce canopy by 4 metres; Box Tree (T40)- fell; Lime (T41)- Crown reduction by 2m; Silver Maple (T43)- crown reduction by 3m. Lime trees (T19, T24, T28, T31-34, T37) and Oak (T39)- remove deadwood.
decision_conditions: Not exceed the tree works approved
